strategies.name: Anchor
strategies.explanation: This strategy focuses on supplying USDC on AAVE to earn a stable APY of 3.75%. By utilizing USDC primarily, we aim for minimal volatility and steady growth over time.
risk_factors: Minimal volatility due to USDC focus

strategies.name: Zenith
strategies.explanation: This Zenith strategy involves supplying USDC on AAVE to earn 3.75% APY, borrowing ETH against the supplied USDC to leverage, and then supplying the borrowed ETH back to earn additional yield. This balanced approach aims to generate moderate leverage while maintaining a reasonable health factor.

strategies.name: Wildcard
strategies.explanation: This Wildcard strategy involves supplying all USDC to AAVE for a 3.75% APY, then borrowing 2.5 ETH against it at 2.1% APY, and supplying the borrowed ETH back for a 1.82% APY. This recursive leveraging strategy aims to maximize yield through multiple cycles of borrowing and supplying.
